After that period I started working as a senior forestry advisor at national level, including inter-institutional coordination with governmental and intergovernmental organizations, private sector and research institutes in Bolivia and in the region.
During the last 2,5 years I combined my job as a senior advisor with the overall responsibility of the SNV Regional office in Santa Cruz, Bolivia, being in charge of the full management of the office, including strategic planning, execution of planned activities, human resource management (SNV advisors and supporting staff), inter-institutional relations,  budget management, and management of "Small Embassy Projects" of the Embassy of the Netherlands.', 'title': 'Senior Forestry Advisor/Office Manager', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'FAO (Food and Agriculture Organization)', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 1989}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 1993}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 1989}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 1993}}, 'company': 'FAO (Food and Agriculture Organization)', 'description': "The first 2 years I worked as an Associate Professional Officer (APO) in a FAO project with the objective to increase fuel wood production in the Northwestern area of Sierra Leone because of an increasing demand on fuel wood and carbon in Freetown, the capital of Sierra Leone. After this contract I started working in the Bolivian office of a by the Netherlands funded Andean project to promote participatory sustainable forest management.
